participant_1.background:
I try to start my mornings with a fresh cup of coffee and a healthy breakfast.
i design jewelry when i have spare time.
i love to read fantasy novels and poetry.
I sometimes get a little too nostalgic when I think about my childhood.
i love to fish.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i like the beatles.
I'm looking forward to seeing Justin Timberlake in concert this weekend.
I enjoy a variety of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
My favorite book is The Alchemist, because it reminds me that I can achieve anything if I set my mind to it.

content.text: I think I'm going to try to make some jewelry this weekend. I'm not very good at it, but it's fun. What do you like to do for fun?
I love taking care of animals! I have a dog and a cat, and I volunteer at my local animal shelter. What do you like to read?
I love to read fantasy novels and poetry. I just finished reading The Alchemist, which is about a shepherd who goes on a journey in search of treasure. It was a really inspiring book.
I love the Beatles! They're my favorite band. I'm actually looking forward to seeing Justin Timberlake in concert this weekend. What's your favorite music?
I like a variety of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock. I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin. I also like country music.
I love classic rock too! Do you like any modern country music?
I don't listen to much modern country music, but I do like some of the stuff that Carrie Underwood sings.
Carrie Underwood is great! I'm glad we have something in common
